headline: PulteGroup (PHM): Assessing Valuation After Recent Pullback and Strong Multi‑Year Shareholder Returns
summary: PulteGroup (PHM) has been drifting lower over the past week, even though the stock is still up solidly this year. That disconnect between recent weakness and longer term gains is catching investors attention. See our latest analysis for PulteGroup. That recent 7 day share price return of minus 5.29 percent looks more like a breather within a longer upswing, given the 11.24 percent year to date share price gain and a very strong 3 year total shareholder return of 167.79 percent. If PulteGroup...
